definition: to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

pinyin: yin1 te4 wang3 ti2 gong1 shang1

sentences.english: The largest vendors of the system are UTStarcom and ZTE.
sentences.chinese: 小灵通终端最大的提供商是UT斯达康和中兴。

sentences.english: These specifications will define interfaces between consumers and producers of the service.
sentences.chinese: 这些规范会定义服务消费者与提供商之间的接口。

sentences.english: Becoming customers' top choice for Intelligent IT Platform solutions, especially for Small and Medium size Business (SMB).
sentences.chinese: 成为客户首选的智能信息产品与解决方案提供商。

sentences.english: This entire process varies depending on your cloud provider.
sentences.chinese: 具体流程因云提供商而异。

sentences.english: Educating consumers and providers on the benefits of risk mitigation and countermeasures.
sentences.chinese: 向消费者和提供商说明降低风险的对策的好处。

sentences.english: Pay TV providers pose the larger threat to Netflix.
sentences.chinese: 对于网飞来说，更大的威胁来自付费电视提供商。

sentences.english: Then they switch internet service providers and lose the olde -mail.
sentences.chinese: 然后转因特网服务提供商和失去旧电子邮件。

sentences.english: Another factor is the growth of 3PLs.
sentences.chinese: 另一因素是第三方物流提供商的发展。

sentences.english: Much of the information is purchased from other data providers.
sentences.chinese: 多数信息是从其他资料提供商购买的。

sentences.english: Shanghai Epic does not collect AACS Content Provider Fees.
sentences.chinese: 上海新索不收取AACS内容提供商费用。

sentences.english: Becoming more useful to third-party service providers needs to be the watchword for operators in the future.
sentences.chinese: 在未来，有利于第三方服务提供商将是运营商的口号。

sentences.english: And it is less expensive for service providers to upgrade their equipment to than LTE.
sentences.chinese: 对于服务提供商而言，升级设备的成本要比LTE低。

sentences.english: Makers of business applications are also on the defensive.
sentences.chinese: 业务应用提供商也采取了守势。

sentences.english: Hardware Malfunction, call your hardware vend or for support.
sentences.chinese: 硬件故障，请让你的硬件提供商提供技术支持。

sentences.english: When you're evaluating proposals from service providers, don't be afraid to ask questions.
sentences.chinese: 评价提供商的能力时，要多询问问题。

sentences.english: Golang library for abstracting cloud provider API?
sentences.chinese: 一个抽象的云提供商API戈兰尼图书馆？

definition: operator (of a power station, transport network etc)/carrier (telecommunications etc)
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
